entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
